name: linter_test
description: Testing amp-toolbox linter package in loop

scripts.postinstall: mkdir amp-toolbox; cd amp-toolbox; git init; git remote add -f origin https://github.com/Dbrown910/amp-toolbox.git; git config core.sparseCheckout true; echo "packages/linter" >> .git/info/sparse-checkout; git checkout batchRunTimeO; git pull --depth=1 origin batchRunTimeoutFix; cd ./packages/linter; npm i; npm run build; cd ../../..; npm i ./amp-toolbox/packages/linter
